description:
Presenting you the mass treat #Kurchimadathapetti telugu song from the most awaited movie #GunturKaaram is here to make the promises to be a spicy and energetic treat for the audience, starring the Super star #MaheshBabu, alongside #Sreeleela and Meenkashii Chaudary. With musical masterpiece #Thamans and in the vocals of #SahithiChaganti and #SriKrishna.

Singers - Sahithi Chaganti & Sri Krishna 
& Superstar ( Mahesh babu ) DLG

Dialogue - Kurchi madatapetti ( Kurchi Thatha &

& Kurchi Thatha (
